location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 1 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bassidore [Bāsaʻīdū] to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Government, Military Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Bombay Government that Lieutenant Nesbitt Strong, Commander of the Escort at the Bushire Residency, has been permitted to return to Bombay on health grounds. It notes this course of action was recommended by Assistant Surgeon James Pringle Riach.
